entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Showers beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
